Abandoned Cart is generally defined as someone who has had their "Checkout Pending" for longer then 24 hours. You're going to want to create a workflow that moves the Deal Stage from Pending to Abandoned for no activity in 24 hours.

If you have the ecomm bridge setup, it should do it automatically
Maybe the wrong place to ask, but does anyone know how to turn on the Drag and Drop email builder on their portal without HubSpot assistance?
You couldn't, it was an opt in beta. But anyways everyone already has it now, no need to have it enabled. Shows when creating a new email
